book.title: The Unwanted Wife (Unwanted #1)
book.description: Storyline: The Unwanted Wife (Unwanted #1) \n All Alessandro de Lucci wants from his wife is a son but after a year and a half of unhappiness and disillusionment, all Theresa de Lucci wants from her ice cold husband is a divorce. Unfortunate timing, since Theresa is about to discover that she’s finally pregnant and Alessandro is about to discover that he isn’t willing to lose Theresa.\n
book.author: Natasha Anders
